definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: outgoing, extremity, souce (?), escape; only pl.; chiefly P and late;—abs. [[תוֹחָאוֹת]] Ps 68:21; cstr. [[תוֹחְאוֹת]] Pr 4:23 + Jos 18:19 Qr (Kt [[תוחאותיו]]); [[תּוֹחְאׂת]] Nu 34:8, Ez Eze 48:30; [[תּׂחְאוֹת]] Jos 15:4 + 2 t.; sf. [[תּוֹחְאׂתָיו]] Nu 34:4 + 3 t.; [[תּׂחְאׂתָיו]] Jos 15:7 + 8 t. + Jos 16:3 Qr (Kt [[תחאתו]]); [[תּוֹחְאוֹתָם]] 1Ch 5:16; —

outgoing, extremity of border of territory Jos 16:3, Jos 17:18 (both JE), elsewhere P: Nu 34:4, Nu 34:5, Nu 34:8, Nu 34:9, Nu 34:12, Jos 15:4, Jos 15:7, Jos 15:11, Jos 16:8, Jos 17:9, Jos 18:12, Jos 18:14, Jos 18:19, Jos 19:14, Jos 19:22, Jos 19:20, Jos 19:33; outskirts of city Ez Eze 48:20, cf. 1Ch 5:16.
´[[לַמָּוֶת ת]] Ps 68:21 escapes from (lit. for, i.e. in view of) death.
